In accordance with Section 5-801 of the Philadelphia Home Rule Charter, Section 13-101 of the Philadelphia Code and the Regulations of the Philadelphia Water,Sewer and Storm Water Rate Board, the Philadelphia Water Department filed proposed changes to rates and charges for fiscal years 2017 and 2018 with the Department of Records on February 8, 2016. The Rate Board will hold public and technical hearings on those proposed changes and will issue a decision within 120 days of that filing. Anyone wishing to become an active Participant in the rate change proceedings should send notice to Frances Beckley, Law Department, 1515 Arch Street 17th Floor, Philadelphia PA 19106 or Frances.Beckley@phila.gov
